features: Pure Sine Wave, Automatic Voltage Regulation, LCD Display, USB Charging Port
description: The Santak C2K UPS is a high-capacity uninterruptible power supply designed to safeguard your critical equipment. With a capacity of 2000VA and 1200W, it ensures an extended battery runtime of up to 180 minutes. This UPS offers 8 outlets, providing a combination of battery backup and surge protection. Key features include pure sine wave output, automatic voltage regulation, an LCD display for monitoring, and a USB charging port. The UPS operates at a frequency of 50/60 Hz, and it relies on a reliable sealed lead-acid battery. Despite its high performance, it operates quietly with a noise level of less than 40 dB. The black UPS unit has a weight of 11.5 kg and dimensions of 380 x 200 x 190 mm, making it suitable for various applications.

features: Simulated Sine Wave, AVR, Multifunction LCD Panel, USB Charging Port
description: The Santak S1K UPS is a reliable uninterruptible power supply designed to protect your equipment from power interruptions. It boasts a capacity of 1000VA and 600W, ensuring a battery runtime of up to 120 minutes. Equipped with 6 outlets for a combination of battery backup and surge protection, this UPS provides essential power backup. Notable features include simulated sine wave output, automatic voltage regulation (AVR), a multifunction LCD panel for easy monitoring, and a convenient USB charging port. The UPS operates at a frequency of 50/60 Hz and relies on a sealed lead-acid battery for consistent performance. It operates quietly with a noise level of less than 45 dB. The black UPS unit weighs 9.0 kg and has dimensions of 350 x 180 x 170 mm, making it a versatile power protection solution.

features: Simulated Sine Wave, LED Indicators, USB Charging Port
description: The Santak M500 UPS is a compact power protection solution, ideal for various applications. With a capacity of 500VA and 300W, it offers a battery runtime of up to 90 minutes. This UPS provides 4 outlets with a combination of battery backup and surge protection. Key features include simulated sine wave output, LED indicators, and a USB charging port. The UPS operates at a frequency of 50/60 Hz, utilizing a reliable sealed lead-acid battery. It operates quietly with a noise level of less than 35 dB. The black UPS unit has a weight of 7.5 kg and dimensions of 320 x 160 x 150 mm.
